subject: Funerals
Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: About 3,000 people came to say goodbye to Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor, shot and killed last week during an attempted burglary of the player’s Miami home.
snippet: About 3,000 people came to say goodbye to Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor, shot and killed last week during an attempted burglary of the player’s Miami home.
